languages.text: "Нечисть, что ты допустил{mf||а} в ряды своих спутников, должна умереть. Такова воля Его и мой долг, Вольный Торговец". {n}Глаза Ардженты горят бешеным, испепеляющим огнем.{/n}
"The abomination that you have allowed into the ranks of your companions must die. This is His will and my duty, Rogue Trader." {n}Argenta's eyes burn with a frenzied, incinerating fire.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Нечисть, что ты допустил{mf||а} в ряды своих спутников, должна умереть. Такова воля Его и мой долг, Вольный Торговец". {n}Глаза Ардженты горят бешеным, испепеляющим огнем.{/n}

languages.text: “你带来的这只怪物必须被消灭。这是神皇的旨意，也是我的使命，行商浪人。”{n}阿洁塔的眼中喷射出狂热的烈火。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The abomination that you have allowed into the ranks of your companions must die. This is His will and my duty, Rogue Trader." {n}Argenta's eyes burn with a frenzied, incinerating fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你带来的这只怪物必须被消灭。这是神皇的旨意，也是我的使命，行商浪人。”{n}阿洁塔的眼中喷射出狂热的烈火。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «La abominación que ha admitido en el seno de su séquito debe morir. Esta es Su voluntad y mi deber, Comerciante Independiente». {n}Una llama de furia arrebatadora arde en la mirada de Argenta.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The abomination that you have allowed into the ranks of your companions must die. This is His will and my duty, Rogue Trader." {n}Argenta's eyes burn with a frenzied, incinerating fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «La abominación que ha admitido en el seno de su séquito debe morir. Esta es Su voluntad y mi deber, Comerciante Independiente». {n}Una llama de furia arrebatadora arde en la mirada de Argenta.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « L'abomination que vous semblez accepter dans les rangs de vos compagnons doit mourir. Cela relève de Sa volonté et de mon devoir, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. » {n}Les yeux d'Argenta brûlent d'une flamme frénétique.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The abomination that you have allowed into the ranks of your companions must die. This is His will and my duty, Rogue Trader." {n}Argenta's eyes burn with a frenzied, incinerating fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « L'abomination que vous semblez accepter dans les rangs de vos compagnons doit mourir. Cela relève de Sa volonté et de mon devoir, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. » {n}Les yeux d'Argenta brûlent d'une flamme frénétique.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Die Abscheulichkeit, die Ihr in die Reihen Eurer Gefährten aufgenommen habt, muss sterben. So lautet Sein Wille und meine Pflicht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." {n}In Argentas Augen brennt ein wütendes, loderndes Feuer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The abomination that you have allowed into the ranks of your companions must die. This is His will and my duty, Rogue Trader." {n}Argenta's eyes burn with a frenzied, incinerating fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Abscheulichkeit, die Ihr in die Reihen Eurer Gefährten aufgenommen habt, muss sterben. So lautet Sein Wille und meine Pflicht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." {n}In Argentas Augen brennt ein wütendes, loderndes Feuer.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたが仲間に向かいれた、かの醜悪なる者は、死なねばならぬ者だ。これは主の意志にして、私の責務だ、自由開拓者」{n}アルジェンタの目には、燃える炎のごとき熱狂が浮かんでいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The abomination that you have allowed into the ranks of your companions must die. This is His will and my duty, Rogue Trader." {n}Argenta's eyes burn with a frenzied, incinerating fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが仲間に向かいれた、かの醜悪なる者は、死なねばならぬ者だ。これは主の意志にして、私の責務だ、自由開拓者」{n}アルジェンタの目には、燃える炎のごとき熱狂が浮かんでいた。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Yoldaş safına kabul ettiğin bu ucubenin ölmesi gerek. İmparator'un arzusu, benim de görevim budur Hür Tacir." {n}Argenta'nın gözlerinde hararetli, alev alev bir yangın kopuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The abomination that you have allowed into the ranks of your companions must die. This is His will and my duty, Rogue Trader." {n}Argenta's eyes burn with a frenzied, incinerating fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yoldaş saflarına kabul ettiğin bu ucubenin ölmesi gerek. İmparator'un arzusu, benim de görevim bu Hür Tacir." {n}Argenta'nın gözlerinde hararetli, alev alev bir yangın kopuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
